import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as logFunc from './loginFunctions.js' import './logOrsign.css' // import { FaFacebookF, FaTwitterSquare } from "react-icons/fa"; export default function LogOrsign ({ history }) { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({}) console.log(userData) if (userData == null) { window.location.href = './Admin' } const handleChangeEvent = (e, title) => { const value = e.target.value setUserData({ ...userData, [title]: value }) } const submitData = e => { e.preventDefault() logFunc.logUserIn(userData) .then(response => response.data) .then(data => { history.push('/Admin') window.location.href = '/Admin/home' sessionStorage.setItem('admin', 'admin') console.log(data) }) } return (
{/*
*/}

{ submitData(e) }}>
handleChangeEvent(e, 'email')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'password')} />
) }
